show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: The Bubble That Started To Burst And Had Second Thoughts

title: The Bubble That Started To Burst And Had Second Thoughts
content:
Another very grim bout of foreclosures will start next year for all the same reasons as before. <!--more--> This is because the original foreclosure crisis was never solved.
It was deferred.
And now come the consequences.
Transferring money the old way – the American way.
Listen to how things are done elsewhere.
And then put pressure on your bank to come kicking and screaming into the 21stcentury.
New home sales fell again (‘unexpectedly’ – don’t they always?
) in July.
“It’s a little bit disappointing”, said one economist.
The problems of social security revisited with an update.
Some interesting and revealing background to the troubles in Ferguson.
